is a small town in the
There are several trains daily from Prague to Kutná Hora, Světlá nad Sázavou or Čerčany. It is necessary to change the train there to local ones going to Zruč nad Sázavou.
There are 3 direct buses daily (Mo-Fr) from Prague (from the bus station Prague-Roztyly) to Zruč nad Sázavou and many other local buses with the need to change buses.
Rent a car or use your own is also an option. Use higway D1 from Prague to Brno and use the exit 56 to get here.
There is a large network of cycling paths around the town. The local cycling path along the river is nice way how to spend time with short ride as well as in-line skating or walking.
The best way for exploring the town is walking. Everything is close and well-signed.

value: hours=The castle is open daily 10AM-5PM in high season (April 26 - September 31), it is necessary to make a reservation during the rest of the year
price=Prices for adult/child; short tour CZK 50/30, long tour CZK 100/50, tower CZK 30/20

content=You can choose from castle tours - short (interiors), long (interiors, chapel, tower, galery) or tower. There is also possibility to buy tickets for museums or for adventurous trail of the Knight Milota from Kolowrat.
name=Museum of dolls and teddy bears
hours=The museum is open daily 10AM-5PM in high season (April 26 - September 31), it is necessary to make a reservation during the rest of the year
content=Come and visit the attic of castle, where dolls and teddy bears live together, play and read books.
hours=The museum is open daily 10AM-5PM in high season (April 26 - September 31), it is necessary to make a reservation during the rest of the year
content=You can visit museum of shoemaking on the ground floor of castle.

content=The castle is surrounded by park with lots of statues and more or less rare species of trees. You can also find other monuments such as tower of Kolowrat, former storehouse, bower with small pond, moat or old cemetery for dogs.
name=Church of the Elevation of the Holy Cross
hours=The Church is open only during services
content=The church forms together with castle a panorama for visitors who come from the south. You can see a mortuary next to the church.
name=Amusement park - Adventurous trail of the Knight Milota from Kolowrat
hours=The trail is open daily 10AM-5PM in high season (April 26 - September 31), only in good weather condition
content=Come here, young squire, to prove your skill in disciplines of knights.
content=Playground with special tracks for marbles, swings, climbing frames, traffic course etc.
content=This centre concentrates library, gym, exhibitions, lectures etc.
hours=Information centre is open daily 26 April-31 September 10AM-5PM, for the rest of the year Mo,We 7AM-5PM Tu,Th 7AM-3PM Fr 7 AM-2PM
content=Along to tickets to castle you can buy some souveniers such as postcards, books, T-shirts, local spirits made of honey, calendars, ceramics, candels etc.
content=Offers nice rooms under the castle near the old town centre. You can also enjoy a café in this pension.

— historical town with famous St. Barbara cathedral, old silver mines and the Chapel of All Saints, which is decorated with thousands of human bones; 30 km away by car, trains and buses are also an option
